mapper.select: SELECT PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, U_NICKNAME, U_EMAIL FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, U_NICKNAME, U_EMAIL FROM (SELECT A.PARENT_SEQ, A.COMMENT_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(A.WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, '') WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME, '') U_NICKNAME, NVL(B.U_EMAIL, '') U_EMAIL FROM WD_COMMENT A, WD_USER B WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{value} AND A.C_STATUS IN('Y', 'N') AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY A.REG_DATE DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 10
SELECT NVL(COUNT(COMMENT_SEQ), 0) COMMENT_SEQ FROM WD_COMMENT WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{value} AND C_STATUS NOT IN('R')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WD_COMMENT ( USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, C_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{wdFBoardComment}, SYSDATE, #{parentSeq}, #{commentSeq}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(COMMENT_SEQ), 0) COMMENT_SEQ FROM WD_COMMENT WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{value}

SELECT PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, U_NICKNAME, U_EMAIL FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, U_NICKNAME, U_EMAIL FROM( SELECT A.PARENT_SEQ, A.COMMENT_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(A.WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, '') WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME, '') U_NICKNAME, NVL(B.U_EMAIL, '') U_EMAIL FROM WD_COMMENT A, WD_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY PARENT_SEQ ASC, COMMENT_SEQ ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM WD_COMMENT
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_COMMENT SET C_STATUS = 'N' WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{parentSeq} AND COMMENT_SEQ = #{commentSeq} AND C_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE WD_COMMENT SET C_STATUS = 'R' WHERE PARENT_SEQ = #{parentSeq} AND COMMENT_SEQ = #{commentSeq} AND C_STATUS = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, U_NICKNAME, U_EMAIL, C_STATUS FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, PARENT_SEQ, COMMENT_SEQ, USER_ID, WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, REG_DATE, U_NICKNAME, U_EMAIL, C_STATUS FROM( SELECT A.PARENT_SEQ, A.COMMENT_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(A.WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, '') WD_FBOARD_COMMENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(B.U_NICKNAME, '') U_NICKNAME, NVL(B.U_EMAIL, '') U_EMAIL, NVL(A.C_STATUS, '') C_STATUS FROM WD_COMMENT A, WD_USER B WHERE C_STATUS IN ('N','R') AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID ORDER BY PARENT_SEQ ASC, COMMENT_SEQ ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM WD_COMMENT WHERE C_STATUS = 'N'
